{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":150981,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラはペルエレの手を","translatedEnglishLine":"Seela tightly held Peruele's hand,"},{"lineNumber":150982,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぎゅっと掴んだまま固まっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and remained frozen, gripping it firmly."},{"lineNumber":150983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":150984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいこら、離せ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, let go.\""},{"lineNumber":150985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……やだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No.\""},{"lineNumber":150986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やだ、て……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, you say...\""},{"lineNumber":150987,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんた……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You... "},{"lineNumber":150988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の前でだけ我が儘になるわよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"only become selfish in front of me, don’t you?\""},{"lineNumber":150989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":150990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へーきよ、へーき。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s alright, really."},{"lineNumber":150991,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたが生き残れるなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you can survive,"},{"lineNumber":150992,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の方がよっぽど楽勝よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have it way easier.\""},{"lineNumber":150993,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":150994,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、死んだ時は化けて出るけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I’ll probably haunt you if I die though.\""},{"lineNumber":150995,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、やっぱり私が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, just as I thought, it’s me who...\""},{"lineNumber":150996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああもう！　うっとうしい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, geez! So annoying!\""},{"lineNumber":150997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":150998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... "},{"lineNumber":150999,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悩む必要ないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess there’s no need to worry.\""},{"lineNumber":151000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、決めた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, I’ve decided.\""},{"lineNumber":151001,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクの城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring Castle—"},{"lineNumber":151002,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラング・バウから出発したランス達、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others, who departed from Lang Bau,"},{"lineNumber":151003,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人討伐隊が昼間、城に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon subjugation squad, arrived at the castle during the day."},{"lineNumber":151004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、今度こそ何度目かの正直！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, this time is for sure the charm!"},{"lineNumber":151005,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日でケッセルリンクとの戦いも終わりにする！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Today, we’ll end the battle with Kesselring!\""},{"lineNumber":151006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes.\""},{"lineNumber":151007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now all that’s left..."},{"lineNumber":151008,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ペルエレが上手くやってくれてるかどうかだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"is whether Peruele is handling things well.\""},{"lineNumber":151009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう、ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that’s right...\""},{"lineNumber":151010,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、その時――","translatedEnglishLine":"And at that moment—"},{"lineNumber":151011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーい、こっちこっち！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, over here, over here!\""},

{"lineNumber":151012,"originalJapaneseLine":"正面玄関からペルエレが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruele appeared from the main entrance."},

{"lineNumber":151013,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がケッセルリンクの城の中を","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others were"},{"lineNumber":151014,"originalJapaneseLine":"悠々と歩いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"walking leisurely inside Kesselring’s castle."},

{"lineNumber":151015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、ペルエレの癖にやるではないか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, for someone like Peruele, you did well!"},

{"lineNumber":151016,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うまくいったようだな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems to have gone smoothly!\""},

{"lineNumber":151017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ペルエレの癖に、ってのは余計よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Calling me 'for someone like Peruele' is unnecessary.\""},{"lineNumber":151018,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これ、ちゃんと後で危険手当出しなさいよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Make sure to give me a hazard pay later for this.\""},{"lineNumber":151019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah."},{"lineNumber":151020,"originalJapaneseLine":"　期待してくれて構わないぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You can expect that without hesitation.\""},{"lineNumber":151021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、メイド達は？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what about the maids?"},{"lineNumber":151022,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それにケッセルリンクも」","translatedEnglishLine":"And Kesselring as well?\""},{"lineNumber":151023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どちらも寝てるわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They’re both asleep."},{"lineNumber":151024,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メイド達はもらってたアイテムの睡眠ガスで、","translatedEnglishLine":"The maids were put to sleep by the sleeping gas they were given,"},{"lineNumber":151025,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンクは元から昼間は寝てる」","translatedEnglishLine":"and Kesselring naturally sleeps during the day.\""},{"lineNumber":151026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、よくやった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, well done."},{"lineNumber":151027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後でセックスしてやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll have sex with you later.\""},{"lineNumber":151028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いらんがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don’t need that.\""},{"lineNumber":151029,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、とりあえずこっちの部屋に入って」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, for the time being, let’s go into this room.\""},{"lineNumber":151030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おうおう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラはペルエレの手を
ぎゅっと掴んだまま固まっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and remained frozen, gripping it firmly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいこら、離せ」
「あんた……
私の前でだけ我が儘になるわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only become selfish in front of me, don’t you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へーきよ、へーき。
あんたが生き残れるなら、
私の方がよっぽど楽勝よ」
「ま、死んだ時は化けて出るけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I’ll probably haunt you if I die though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ、やっぱり私が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, just as I thought, it’s me who..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう！　うっとうしい！」
悩む必要ないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess there’s no need to worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、決めた」
ケッセルリンクの城――
ラング・バウから出発したランス達、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others, who departed from Lang Bau,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊が昼間、城に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon subjugation squad, arrived at the castle during the day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、今度こそ何度目かの正直！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, this time is for sure the charm!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日でケッセルリンクとの戦いも終わりにする！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, we’ll end the battle with Kesselring!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい」
「後は……
ペルエレが上手くやってくれてるかどうかだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is whether Peruele is handling things well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、ですね……」
と、その時――
「おーい、こっちこっち！」
正面玄関からペルエレが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruele appeared from the main entrance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がケッセルリンクの城の中を
悠々と歩いていた。
「がははは、ペルエレの癖にやるではないか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, for someone like Peruele, you did well!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うまくいったようだな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems to have gone smoothly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ペルエレの癖に、ってのは余計よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calling me 'for someone like Peruele' is unnecessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ、ちゃんと後で危険手当出しなさいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Make sure to give me a hazard pay later for this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい。
期待してくれて構わないぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can expect that without hesitation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、メイド達は？
それにケッセルリンクも」
「どちらも寝てるわ。
メイド達はもらってたアイテムの睡眠ガスで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The maids were put to sleep by the sleeping gas they were given,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは元から昼間は寝てる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kesselring naturally sleeps during the day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、よくやった。
後でセックスしてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll have sex with you later."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いらんがな」
「さ、とりあえずこっちの部屋に入って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, for the time being, let’s go into this room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おうおう」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラはペルエレの手を
ぎゅっと掴んだまま固まっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and remained frozen, gripping it firmly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいこら、離せ」
「あんた……
私の前でだけ我が儘になるわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only become selfish in front of me, don’t you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へーきよ、へーき。
あんたが生き残れるなら、
私の方がよっぽど楽勝よ」
「ま、死んだ時は化けて出るけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I’ll probably haunt you if I die though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ、やっぱり私が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, just as I thought, it’s me who..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう！　うっとうしい！」
悩む必要ないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess there’s no need to worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、決めた」
ケッセルリンクの城――
ラング・バウから出発したランス達、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others, who departed from Lang Bau,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊が昼間、城に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon subjugation squad, arrived at the castle during the day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、今度こそ何度目かの正直！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, this time is for sure the charm!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日でケッセルリンクとの戦いも終わりにする！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, we’ll end the battle with Kesselring!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい」
「後は……
ペルエレが上手くやってくれてるかどうかだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is whether Peruele is handling things well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、ですね……」
と、その時――
「おーい、こっちこっち！」
正面玄関からペルエレが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruele appeared from the main entrance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がケッセルリンクの城の中を
悠々と歩いていた。
「がははは、ペルエレの癖にやるではないか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, for someone like Peruele, you did well!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うまくいったようだな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems to have gone smoothly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ペルエレの癖に、ってのは余計よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calling me 'for someone like Peruele' is unnecessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ、ちゃんと後で危険手当出しなさいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Make sure to give me a hazard pay later for this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい。
期待してくれて構わないぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can expect that without hesitation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、メイド達は？
それにケッセルリンクも」
「どちらも寝てるわ。
メイド達はもらってたアイテムの睡眠ガスで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The maids were put to sleep by the sleeping gas they were given,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは元から昼間は寝てる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kesselring naturally sleeps during the day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、よくやった。
後でセックスしてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll have sex with you later."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いらんがな」
「さ、とりあえずこっちの部屋に入って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, for the time being, let’s go into this room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おうおう」
